name: THE INNER CIRCLE
description:
Will you be able to successfully navigate through restricted areas of the government building and obtain incriminating material to expose them?

Ludum Dare 47

This game was made for the Ludum Dare 47 with the theme "Stuck in a Loop" and it was completely from scratch within 72 hours.

If you participated in the Ludum Dare yourself, please consider rating our game over there. We really appreciate it and if you leave a comment, we will return the favor and play your game too.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/the-inner-circle

How to Play
  • Use WASD to Move the character
  • Use Shift to sneak
  • Use E to Pick Up and Interact
Team
  • Thomas Stadler - Game and Level Design, Story
  • Guido Prodnik - Game and Level Design, Story
  • Sebastian Uitz (https://firetotemgames.com/) - Programming
  • Philipp Auer - Programming
  • Veit Isopp - Programming
  • Manuel Santner (https://polylabs.org/)- 3D Assets
  • Alessandro Chiovoloni - 2D Assets
  • Michael Steinkellner (https://www.merlinnsound.com/) - Music and Sound Effects

Voice Talent / Voice Actor:

  • Julia Daniczek
  • Rhys Seeburger
  • Sam Teale
Changes
